name: The Parkland Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
Welcome to our home, a beautiful 19th century chateau set in 9 acres of private parkland. This stunning chateau is available as an exclusive use Wedding Venue for your special day.
Built around 1850, this beautiful period Chateau is situated in stunning open countryside and surrounded by 9 acres of private gardens and woodland.
We have both indoor and outdoor areas, each of which can host up to 50 guests. During the Summer months, if you would prefer an outdoor ceremony you can make use of the arbour within our walled garden. We also have 1 hectare of woodland perfect for a ceremony overlooking the Loire valley.
The Chateau has recently undergone a sympathetic programme of renovation over the past 18 years and we now look forward to welcoming you for your wedding celebrations.
For weddings you will enjoy exclusive use of the Chateau reception room, all three suites accommodating up to 12 guests, our Gate House accommodating another 6 guests, our beautiful old Chapel which is now a comfortable lounge/dining room with a fully equipped kitchen in the old vestry and our three bedroomed gate house.
Situated on the edge of a 10,000 acre Forest - a gateway to idyllic market towns; on the doorstep of the stunning Normandy landing beaches and just a stone’s throw from Le Mans for racing enthusiasts It's perfectly located for you to explore the delights of rural Normandy and beyond!
Accommodation:
Enjoy luxury self-catering accommodation, chambre d'hote and gite. We can provide bed and breakfast accommodation or self catering depending on your requirements.
We offer you a combination of contemporary modern finishes, interspersed with a wholesome country feel. We make sure that everything is tailored to meet the needs of the more discerning guest, by delivering all our guests with a 5 star experience from the moment they arrive, with complimentary English breakfast tea and homemade cake. Our aim is to transport all of our guests back to the age of sophistication, decadence and luxury.
What is included
The exclusive use of the Chateau as your very own house for the duration of your stay.
Capacity for up to 50 daytime guests, more than that would require the hire of a marquee.
A choice of either round or trestle style tables with chairs.
The use of any accessories or decoration here within the house.
Our sound system for your playlists.
The gardens and grounds including use of our firepits and festoon lit pergola with wood burning stove during the evening.
3 suites including a beautiful bridal suite, plus our single double room, all of which are used exclusively by you and your guests for the night of your wedding.
Our Gate House which accommodates another 6 guests.
A tasty, locally sourced continental breakfast the morning after your stay for all overnight guests.
Our expertise and support to help ensure everything runs perfectly.
Exclusive hire prices start from £4950
If you are interested in hiring this venue then please do get in touch with us and we will be more than happy to welcome you and help you plan your dream wedding.
